creator: hauser@acm.org
text:
add a hint to sslstart etc.
since after all, the usage of added security should be encouraged through all
steps of the installation process.

Companion suggestions in
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15624,
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15625,
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15626, 
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15628,
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15629,
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15630,

and re httpd.conf also http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15631
creator: hauser@acm.org

text:
apachectl startssl is deprecated.

Instead, people should modify apachectl or httpd.conf to always use
mod_ssl when it is present.
creator: slive@apache.org
